actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit a State to exclude from coverage (by a modification or additional modification of the applicable State agreement under section 218 of that Act) any service performed by election officials or election workers in cases where the remuneration paid for such service is less than $100 in a calendar quarter (rather than only where such remuneration is less than $100 in a calendar year as presently permitted).
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to permit a State to exclude from coverage service performed by election officials or election workers if the remuneration paid for such service: (1) is less than $100 in a calendar year; or (2) is less than $100 in a calendar quarter.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit a State to exclude from coverage (by a modification or additional modification of the applicable State agreement under section 218 of that Act) any service performed by election officials or election workers in cases where the remuneration paid for such service is less than $100 in a calendar quarter (rather than only where such remuneration is less than $100 in a calendar year as presently permitted).
